instruction: Generate a list of innovative app ideas for a digital store.
output:
1. An AI-driven personal assistant app that helps customers find suitable products.
2. A self-care app with curated products to support users' mental health.
3. An augmented reality app that lets users try on clothes and accessories in real-time.
4. An app that helps users find discounts on products they already want to buy. 
5. A virtual wardrobe app that lets users organize and categorize their clothes.
6. An app that helps people discover new items based on their interests.
7. An app that curates clothing based on seasons and weather.
8. A photo editor app with filters that help people choose items that match their style.
9. A digital marketplace that focuses on curating and selling artisanal crafts and products.
10. A marketplace app that allows customers to sell and trade used clothes.
